long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows Windows and Mac devices using the Chrome browser to be supported by Impero’s cloud-based classroom management solution. Enable teachers to deliver digital learning anywhere, on any device. 

Supported features:

Launch website – open a web site on the device automatically
Disable internet – disable internet access
Restrict browsing – enforce allow and block website lists
Tab management – view open browser tabs lists and close open tabs
